name: Aberdeen Standard Physical Platinum Shares ETF
description: The Aberdeen Standard Physical Platinum Shares ETF (PPLT) is an exchange-traded fund that provides investors with a convenient and cost-effective way to gain exposure to platinum prices. Launched in 2010, PPLT is designed to track the performance of the price of physical platinum, less expenses, by holding physical platinum bullion stored in secure vaults. This ETF is ideal for investors looking to diversify their portfolios with precious metals, particularly platinum, which is known for its industrial applications, as well as its use in jewelry and investment. The fund seeks to reflect the performance of the S&P GSCI Platinum Index, which is a benchmark that represents the price of platinum. PPLT stands out in the market due to its low expense ratio and its transparent structure, which allows investors to see exactly how their investment is being managed. The ETF is backed by physical platinum, providing a level of security and assurance to investors, especially during times of market volatility. With a growing interest in alternative investments and precious metals, PPLT serves as a strategic option for those looking to hedge against inflation and currency fluctuations.
